means: 天主教加尔都西会教士

sentence.Network_en: Of or relating to the Carthusian order.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡尔特教派的,与卡尔特教派有关的.

sentence.Network_en: Carthusian: member of a contemplative order founded during the 11 th century by Saint Bruno.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡尔特会僧侣: 11世纪由圣·布鲁诺创建的一个提倡苦修冥想的教派的成员.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Carthusian order
1. of or relating to the Carthusian order

auth_sentence.content: His shoes were good, in one of his pockets was an Old Carthusian tie, although he had not himself attended Charterhouse.

auth_sentence.content: The Charterhouse was originally part of a Carthusian Monastery and the foundation stone was laid by King Richard II.
